Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.battlefield

Class SpawnpointBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.battlefield.Block
      • it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.battlefield.SpawnpointBlock
  • public class SpawnpointBlock
extends Block
    This class represents all blocks of the spawnpoint type, which allow a player to grab and put back weapons and also they are the starting blocks of the match

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from class it.polimi.ingsw.server.model.battlefield.Block

    • Constructor Detail

      • SpawnpointBlock

        public SpawnpointBlock​(int row,
                       int column,
                       Block.BorderType borderNorth,
                       Block.BorderType borderEast,
                       Block.BorderType borderSouth,
                       Block.BorderType borderWest,
                       CurrencyColor color,
                       int maxWeapons)
        Class constructor given the position in the board, every BoarderType, the color of the spawnpoint and the weapons it contains
        Parameters:
        row - an int representing the row of the block in the board
        column - an int representing the column of the block in the board
        borderNorth - BorderType of the northern border
        borderEast - BorderType of the eastern border
        borderSouth - BorderType of the southern border
        borderWest - BorderType of the western border
        color - the color associated to the spawnpoint
        maxWeapons - the maximum amount of weapons this block can contain
